summary: A small and simple cave-ish hideout in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
[i][b]If you find any problems, contact me and I will fix them.

The lighting is much better in game, my photos are in bad quality.

Please comment and endorse if you like it :)
[/b][/i]

[size=3][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b][/size]
- Just Skyrim

[b][size=3]LOCATION:[/size][/b]
The hideout is located in Windhelm, near the Grey Quarter. You can see the exact location in the images.

[b][size=3]STORY:[/size][/b]
You can read it in the diary.


[i]All containers are safe![/i]

[b][size=3]FEATURES:[/size][/b]
-Free,small hideout
-Cooking pot and food storage
-Campfire - YOU NEED TO LIGHT IT USING A FIRE SPELL !
-Chest for storage
-Two bedrolls
-Two chairs and a table
-A diary

[b][size=3]HOW TO INSTALL[/size][/b]
Extract the .rar file to your data folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager to install the mod.

[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/b]
This mod can only conflict with mods which change the area where the entrance is placed.
author: Archaonus
